txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Gilded sword sheaths from the Dourhands and Gauredain surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund. Deliver the items to Fotri, overseer of the settlement.
'Good to see that their number will dwindle. Thank you.'
'Our foolish cousins, swayed by evil, and the Gauredain all carry weapons and sheaths. Collect those and deliver them to me here. A reckoning is welcome.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Gilded Sword Sheaths
Fotri, overseer of the dwarves of Forochel, awaits the delivery of gilded sword sheaths at the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
Deliver the gilded sword sheaths to Fotri at Zigilgund in Forochel

You have accepted a task to collect and deliver gilded sword sheaths from the Dourhands and Gauredain surrounding Zigilgund in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to the dwarf-overseer Fotri encamped at the dwarf-home.
Wanted: Gilded sword sheaths from the Dourhands and Gauredain surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
